item.title: FIRSTENERGY CORP 10-K
item.description: FIRSTENERGY CORP, which is in the Electric Services [4911] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 13, 2023 had 60719 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
